It seems that Groestlcoin Testnet Eclair Mobile has not been able to run in background lately. Make sure that your phone does not aggressively optimize this application.

Some vendors like Nokia, Xiaomi, Huawei or Samsung run overzealous custom battery savers preventing non white-listed apps to run in background.

You can check our FAQ for more information.
An new version of Groestlcoin Testnet Eclair Mobile has been released.\n\nPlease keep this app up to date to enjoy the latest features, bug fixes, and improvements!
Seed is not readable; groestlcoin testnet eclair can not start.
Groestlcoin Testnet Eclair could not start within a reasonable time frame. Please check your network settings.
Groestlcoin Testnet Eclair supports passphrase. If you don\'t know what this is, or if you wallet does not have a passphrase, leave this field blank, and click Next.
If you already used Groestlcoin Testnet Eclair Mobile with this seed, you may have remaining active channels that could be restored.

An advanced Lightning/Groestlcoin Testnet mobile wallet by Hash Engineering Solutions (based on eclair mobile by ACINQ). It relies on Electrum-GRS servers for access to the Groestlcoin network.

Exchange rates are retrieved from the bitcoinaverage.com api. Note that this conversion to fiat may not be accurate.

This software is compliant with the BOLT specifications (Lightning Network standard).

GRSPay
GRSPay is a self-hosted, open-source cryptocurrency payment processor. It's secure, private, censorship-resistant and free.

Congratulations! You can now receive payment over Lightning.

Groestlcoin Testnet Eclair Mobile will watch your channels in the background and will warn you if needed.

Note that you need to make sure that your phone doesn't stay without internet connectivity for more than 1,5 days straight.
Scan a QR code containing a Groestlcoin Testnet address or a Lightning payment request.
Groestlcoin Testnet Eclair Mobile needs write access to your device to make secure local backups.\n\nThis makes your wallet survive an app uninstall.
Share Groestlcoin Testnet Eclair Mobile logs

To protect the funds in your Lightning channels, Groestlcoin Testnet Eclair needs to watch the blockchain once in a while, but has been unable to do so the last few days. Make sure that you have a working internet connection.
Start Groestlcoin Testnet Eclair Mobile for automated retaliation.
